name: Dice Monster: Gambler's Fallacy
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself "man, playing this dungeon crawler is a lot of fun, but keeping up with all of these stats is so hard; if only life and death were determined by mere dice rolls"?

No?

Too bad, because here in Dice Monster: Gambler's Fallacy, that's exactly what you get! Start with 2 dice and 48 health at level 1, and work your way up to 5 dice and 480 health at level 100!

If that isn't quite your cup of tea, try Iron Man Mode, where regen is turned off and every single health point matters! My best is level 8; can you get better luck?
